title: Breadcrumb
description: Navigation trail showing current location in site hierarchy with proper ARIA markup and Schema.org structured data support

metadata.description: Accessible breadcrumb navigation showing page hierarchy from home to current page. Supports multiple separator styles, mobile responsive collapse, and SEO-optimized Schema.org markup for rich snippets in search results.

responsive.mobileCollapse: Shows first item, ellipsis, and last two items on mobile

seo.richSnippets: BreadcrumbList structured data for search engine rich results

usageExamples.title: Basic Breadcrumb
usageExamples.code: {{ breadcrumb({ items: [{ label: 'Home', href: '/' }, { label: 'Products', href: '/products' }, { label: 'Shoes' }] }) }}

usageExamples.title: With Different Separator
usageExamples.description: Breadcrumb using slash separator instead of chevron
usageExamples.code: {{ breadcrumb({ items: [{ label: 'Home', href: '/' }, { label: 'Blog', href: '/blog' }, { label: 'Article' }], separator: 'slash' }) }}

usageExamples.title: With Schema.org Markup
usageExamples.description: SEO-optimized breadcrumb with structured data for rich snippets
usageExamples.code: {{ breadcrumb({ items: [{ label: 'Home', href: '/' }, { label: 'Category', href: '/category' }, { label: 'Page' }], schema: true }) }}

usageExamples.title: Small Size
usageExamples.code: {{ breadcrumb({ items: [{ label: 'Home', href: '/' }, { label: 'Docs', href: '/docs' }, { label: 'Guide' }], size: 'sm' }) }}

usageExamples.title: With Truncation
usageExamples.description: Long breadcrumb items with text truncation enabled
usageExamples.code: {{ breadcrumb({ items: [{ label: 'Home', href: '/' }, { label: 'Very Long Category Name', href: '/category' }, { label: 'Page' }], truncate: true }) }}

items.description: Array of breadcrumb trail items from home to current page

label.description: Display text for the breadcrumb item

href.description: URL for the item (omit for current page - last item typically has no href)

size.description: Size variant for font size and spacing

truncate.description: Enable text truncation for long breadcrumb item labels

schema.description: Include Schema.org BreadcrumbList structured data (JSON-LD) for SEO rich snippets

id.description: Unique identifier for the component instance

ariaLabel.description: Accessible label for the navigation landmark
